title: RetroBar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe bar offering labeled vegan choices (VV) which include polenta with tofu and vegetables, focaccia with rosemary, onion, garlic, plus a few salads. Has a juice bar. Soy and almond milk for hot drinks. Note that the open hours vary, so better call ahead.
